name: SPDR Portfolio S&P 500 High Dividend ETF
description: The SPDR Portfolio S&P 500 High Dividend ETF (SPYD) is an exchange-traded fund that seeks to provide investors with exposure to the top dividend-paying companies in the S&P 500 index. Launched in 2015, SPYD aims to track the performance of the S&P 500 High Dividend Index, which is composed of the 80 highest dividend-yielding stocks from the S&P 500. This ETF is designed for income-focused investors who are looking for a reliable source of dividend income while still benefiting from the potential capital appreciation of the underlying equities. SPYD offers a diversified exposure to various sectors, including utilities, consumer staples, and real estate, making it an attractive option for those seeking to balance income generation with risk management. With a relatively low expense ratio, SPYD provides a cost-effective way to invest in high-yield stocks while enjoying the liquidity and flexibility of trading on an exchange. The ETF pays monthly dividends, allowing investors to receive regular income, which can be reinvested or used for other financial goals. Overall, SPYD is a suitable investment vehicle for those looking to enhance their portfolios with dividend-paying stocks from a diversified range of sectors.

products: SPDR Portfolio S&P 500 High Dividend ETF

seo.meta_title: SPDR Portfolio S&P 500 High Dividend ETF | SPYD
seo.meta_description: Invest in the SPDR Portfolio S&P 500 High Dividend ETF (SPYD) for exposure to high dividend-yielding stocks from the S&P 500 index. Explore the benefits of dividend investing.

faq.question: What is SPYD?
faq.answer: SPYD is an ETF that tracks the performance of the 80 highest dividend-yielding stocks in the S&P 500.

faq.question: How frequently does SPYD pay dividends?
Who manages the SPYD ETF?
faq.answer: SPYD is managed by State Street Global Advisors.

faq.question: What sectors does SPYD invest in?
faq.answer: SPYD invests in sectors such as utilities, consumer staples, and real estate.

faq.question: What is the primary goal of SPYD?
faq.answer: The primary goal of SPYD is to provide investors with income through high dividend yields.
